name: Aurora Legend
description:
Aurora is a fantastic world where you will become the captain of hundreds of magnificent Heroes which will coordinate their powers at your desire. Create and develop the perfect strategy to achieve victory after every single battle and let the adventure lead you with the story of its magical lands. Explore original random dungeons, co-op with other players in this Skyland and enjoy the immersive experience with dramatic storylines and sensational challenging battles.

This artistic masterpiece will surround your ears with the perfect voices of Kana Hanazawa, Aoi Yuki, Sora Amamiya, Tomokazu Sugita (and many other great Japanese voice actors). Enjoy the fabulous soundtracks also created by notable producers. Aurora will be a gift to eyes with perfect visual content from many famous illustrators and designers.
It’s your turn to become a legend in the Skyland!

■ Casual gameplay!
Whether you are watching anime, going to school or going to work, your characters will still fight and advance for you, experience a trouble-free adventure!

■ Start in a new world!
Explore the ancestral mysteries of Aurora's, join hundreds of heroes, learn about their stories and control their skills to conquer the enemies.

■An epic story with unexpected tales!
There’s an infinite number of adventures to get involved with, with unlimited constant events.

■ Craft, enhance and evolve!
With the Runes system, even the weaker weapon can become the strongest one, if you craft and slot your runes wisely, also every single Hero has the potential of becoming the strongest one of your team, develop your own strategies to become the legend that Aurora needs.

■ Keep immersed in the unknown Aurora fantasy world!
Start a journey of exploration with challenges and surprises, don't forget adventure is your first intention.

■ Randomly generated adventure maps!
You will encounter a lot of unknown events filled with unique scenes, please be sure to have strategies in mind to explore and conquer!

■ Recapture the hidden treasures in the Skyland!
You need to form a squad with other adventurers, so call your partners to start an unforgettable journey!

* This application is free to download and offers some optional in-app purchases.
* Internet connectivity required to play. Data charges may apply.
* You must be at least 12 years old to play this game. (PG-12)
